TopicTitle: PSA: Scientists can now make used Goo Canisters and Material Bays reuseable

Articles.Content: Cool, now scientists are like the old mobile lab.... that will save quite a bit of weight.

Harv mentioned this in a devnote.

> 
> to restore inoperable experiments (also something scientists can do now)

> 
> Harv mentioned this in a devnote.

I completely missed it, but its an awesome new feature ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
